task.title: How to Set Up Breakout Rooms in Zoom
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to set up Breakout Rooms in Zoom.

step.cmd: Click on the three dots for additional options, then on Breakout Rooms.

A pop-up window will open for you to choose the number of rooms you want to create. Type the number, hit Assign automatically, then Create. The Assign automatically option will randomly choose the participants for each room.
Another pop-up window will appear showing the number of rooms and the participants assigned to each of them. Next, click on Open All Rooms.
Whenever you want to end the separate sessions in the Zoom meeting, click on Close All Rooms.

taskbody.result: You have created separated sessions in the Zoom meeting for participants to work, collaborate, etc., whatever the purpose.
